text: Alexis Gómez (born 28 February 2000) is an Argentine footballer currently playing as a forward for Estudiantes de Buenos Aires of the Primera B Metropolitana. ==Club career== Gómez signed his first professional contract with Estudiantes in late 2016. After making his debut in a 2–2 draw against Excursionistas, his performances garnered interest from top Argentinian sides River Plate, Boca Juniors and Independiente. ==Career statistics== ===Club=== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center" |- !rowspan="2"|Club !rowspan="2"|Season !colspan="3"|League !colspan="2"|Cup !colspan="2"|Continental !colspan="2"|Other !colspan="2"|Total |- !Division !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals !Apps !Goals |- |rowspan="4"|Estudiantes |2016–17 |rowspan="3"|Primera B Metropolitana |9||0||1Appearances in the Copa Argentina||0|| colspan="2" |–||0||0||10||0 |- |2017–18 |0||0||0||0|| colspan="2" |–||0||0||0||0 |- |2018–19 |0||0||0||0|| colspan="2" |–||0||0||0||0 |- |2019–20 |Primera B Nacional |0||0||0||0|| colspan="2" |–||0||0||0||0 |- ! colspan=3 | Career total !9!!0!!1!!0!!0!!0!!0!!0!!10!!0 |} ;Notes ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Argentine footballers Category:Association football forwards Category:Primera B Metropolitana players Category:Estudiantes de Buenos Aires footballers
